story_30_04000/2401_1101_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team made
their way through town on the heels of their
victory at the PML finals.
story_30_04000/2401_1101_0200_10:
Crowds filled the streets of Pasio in a parade to
celebrate the championship.
story_30_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Of course I did, mon amie! I couldn’t resist joining
in on the big celebrazione!
story_30_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
How does it feel to be champions of the PML and
have all of these people cheering for you?
story_30_04000/2401_0402_1000_10:
*chuckle* But it’s not a dream! You made this
a reality!
story_30_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You made it all the way to the top! It’s hard to
believe how far you’ve come...
story_30_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Can I ask you something, actually?
story_30_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
According to my data, you had to face a number
of sync pairs far more skilled than yourself in
this tournament.
story_30_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
How do you suppose you were able to defeat
such powerful opponents?
story_30_04000/2401_0401_1600_10:
Yeah! [Name:PlayerNickname ] always put the
team first!
story_30_04000/2401_0401_1700_10:
Whenever we saw [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] giving it [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] all, it inspired
us to do our best, too!
story_30_04000/2401_0302_1800_10: We tried harder than anyone else!
story_30_04000/2401_0402_1900_10:
It’s true. We saw you give it your all every time
we battled.
story_30_04000/2401_0402_2000_10: And that pushed us to do our best, too!
story_30_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
My, my! It sounds like you had a lot of influence
on your teammates, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_30_04000/2401_1001_2200_10:
This information will be très bénéfique for my
research on sync stones!
story_30_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: Thanks so much for the chat! Arigato!
story_30_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Now, I won’t delay the parade any longer!
Go soak up the attention! Let all of Pasio see
their new champions!
